text: "Ordinary Lives" is a 1989 written by Bee Gees and is the leading single from their 16th studio album One. It was dedicated to their younger brother Andy Gibb following his death in 1988. It went to number 54 in the United Kingdom, number 27 in the Netherlands, number 8 in Germany and number 19 in Austria. ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Bee Gees songs
title: Ordinary Lives
